front.title: YANG Data Model for IPv6 Neighbor Discovery

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model to configure and manage IPv6 Neighbor Discovery (ND) and related functions, including IPv6 address resolution, redirect function, proxy Neighbor Advertisement, Neighbor Unreachability Detection (NUD), Duplicate Address Detection (DAD), SEcure Neighbor Discovery (SEND), and Secure ND Proxy.
